All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Represents a Deck card with its respective rank and suit
Debug
Class that implements the Debug mode for VideoPoker game, reading and executing the commands according to what the user asks using the Deck provided
Deck
Represents a normal Deck of Cards either loaded by the user or automatically generated (with 52 cards) This class contains an Array of Cards;
DoubleBonus
This class implements a game variant of poker called Double Bonus providing informations like statistics and value of certain Hands when called
Game
Abstract Game class that has a constructor and the methods that a game mode has to obligatory utilise like bet, deal and hold.
GameVariant
Interface that every type of Video Poker game variant should follow
Hand
Represents the cards on the player's hand, with each hand being an array of cards
HandEvaluator
Defines the rules of the poker game, accordingly to the poker variant Double bonus 10/7
Main
Main class of Video poker, it will receive the arguments from the terminal and play accordingly to the game mode selected (currently available: Debug and Simulation)
Player
Class that represents a player which contains a Hand of cards and a credit balance
Round
Class that simulates the basic commands every round of Poker would have
Simulation
Class that implements the Simulation mode for VideoPoker game, betting, dealing and playing with the perfect strategy provided for a provided number of plays
